ygData.subject: I rock!
ygData.msgSnippet: w00t! I rock! Last night I was playing my Gnome Warrior Genmay, I had just hit lvl13, got my dual weild skill, and was hunting Minos in Ak Anon. Well I go in
ygData.messageBody:
w00t! I rock! Last night I was playing my Gnome Warrior Genmay, I had just hit lvl13, got my dual weild skill, and was hunting Minos in Ak'Anon. Well I go in and pull what I think is just one out of the cave but in all reality is actually four slavers! I change to one of the wide views and realize my delima. Figuring that I would probably die before I got to the guard and even then he wouldn't be much help I decide to pull up my boots and lay into them and at least try to do as much damage as possible. I changed from my two Mino battle axes to my Graoning Mace to give me a little better chance of taking at least one, maybe two slavers out before I die. So far i'm doing pretty good! I've killed one and really wailing on another when I get attacked by a stupid giant infected rat! "Oh great!" I thought figuring my fate was sealed. I ignore the rat and keep wailing on the Minos. Luckily somone was nice enough to come by and kill the rat for me. By this time I was down to one bub!
ble of life left and still two Minos to go. I finish off the one I've been working on and go right after the last one. "I'm dead so I might as well die with my boots on!" I thought, Well suddenly the mino takes off and starts running away! "Holy cow! I might make this!" I take off after him and finally kill him.
So now I'm standing there with a smidgen of a bubble left for life, 4 dead mino slavers and a giant diseased rat at my feet. "I have just taken out 4 mino slavers! RRRRRAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA!" I yell. That felt so good!
--
